    • deleteCourse

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'TRAINER\')") public String deleteCourse(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
